basics.name: Diego Souto Catoira
basics.headline: Program Manager. Head of Technology Strategy & Partnerships at Altia

summary.name: Summary
summary.content: Experienced Program Manager at Altia with a proven track record in diverse projects including consulting, software development, system implementation, and support-maintenance. Currently, I focus on advising, pre-sales, and developing value propositions. I actively contribute to internal company improvement processes, spanning quality, technology, and strategy. I also collaborate transversally within Altia Group's Global Risks Unit and serve as Head of Technology Strategy and Partnerships within Altia's Technology Directorate. My past transversal roles include corporate tools, training management, and process improvement. I am committed to continuous learning and strive to instill values of professionalism, responsibility, and dedication to excellence in my teams.

items.name: MyAssistant: AI Chat app and agents for internal use
items.description: Design and development of an AI chat application with agent capabilities for internal use within the company, integrating with various internal systems and databases to enhance productivity and information retrieval.
items.summary:
Give quick access to valuable internal information.

Reduce human intervention in internal service desk.

Improve presales processes

items.name: Development and implementation of a social bond management system.
items.description: Design, development and implementation of a social bond management system for emergency food aid in a council, together with a supermarket chain as a collaborator, using a card.
items.summary:
Hundreds of people benefited from the system

Reduced human intervention and errors

Upscaling social services capacity for helping more people

items.name: Development of the Lugo Smart City initiative.
items.description: Several subprojects, including e-administration, a citizen portal, citizen card upgrades, IoT and water energy management system, smart parking, GIS, OpenData portal, ...
items.summary:
Implemented a new citizen portal.

Upgraded the citizen card system to include new services.

Coordinated several IoT system deployments.

Deployed new servers and virtualization infrastructure.

items.name: Consulting for improving TIC area management processes and implementing a request management tool.
items.description: IT Processes redesign. Implementation of a issue tracking and project management tool
items.summary:
Redefined IT processes for better efficiency

Implemented a robust issue tracking system

items.name: Technical support service in the construction and maintenance of dashboards, reports and indicators.
Technology consulting for the security audit of the data network and ISP network.
items.description: Audited hardened network and servers infrastructure
items.summary: Detected several security issues for fixing

items.name: Support-maintenance service for multiple financial master systems.
items.description: For one of the biggest multinational clothes retailers in the world
items.summary:
Leading corrective and evolutive maintenance for more than 20 master systems.

SLA management and reporting.

Drastically reduced data errors and incidents.

Service improvement through process industrialization.

items.name: SOA platform migration and support-maintenance.
items.description: Implementation and subsequent support-maintenance of a SOA platform, mainly an Enterprise Service Bus (ESB). Includes also service availability, audit flows, failover, balancing, throttling, message routing, ...
items.summary:
Successfully migrated from Oracle Service Bus to WSO2.

.

Deployed new services for several consumer systems.

items.name: Support-maintenance of several corporate systems.
items.description: eLearning, surveys, inventory, endpoint agent, CRM, analytics dashboards, CI/CD...
items.summary:
Containerization. Migration to kubernetes.

Deploying and configuring new corporate systems.

Connected multiple systems through integrations, ETLs, synchronizations,....

items.name: Development, layout and integrations of product portal and private area for order tracking.
items.summary: Focus on Graphic Design and UX

items.name: Development and implementation of the platform for Coruña Smart City.
items.description: The whole platform included IoT, GIS, SSO, SOA, BI, OpenData,...
items.summary:
A 3.5M€ project, included in a +11M€ program with more than 10 pilot projects integrated into platform.

Coordinated a big team of several companies integrating the platform components.

items.name: Development-maintenance of a e-administration platform for public sector
items.description: Evolutive maintenance of a big java web platform
items.summary: Designed and implemented new modules and integrations

items.name: Development and implementation of a provincial asset management platform.
items.description: Big project involving asset management, work orders, maintenance plans, KPIs dashboards, GIS and a Smart City Platform
items.summary:
Whole project involved more than 150 people. I was project manager of asset management platform, KPIs dashboards and GIS integration..

Loaded more than 2.5M georeferenced assets.

items.name: Development of a management system for VAT declarations to European tax agencies.
items.description: Development of a management system for VAT declarations to European tax agencies, integrating client information and automating integration with tax agencies, both in immediate supply and in periodic declarations according to taxpayer calendar, through API and RPA.
items.summary:
Automated VAT declarations process

Reduced human intervention and errors

items.name: Evolution of the Mercurio electronic tendering system. Support for the process of publishing announcements, invitations, presentation of offers (including electronic sealing and sealing), management of openings by contracting tables, award, contract signing, contractor registration, etc. It is a product deployed on-premise and on-cloud (SaaS).
items.description: Development and maintenance of an electronic tendering system.
items.summary:
Big public administrations as customers.

Hundreds millins of euros managed in tenders.

Focus in security, auditability and legal compliance.

items.name: Development and implementation of a citizen card system. A multiservice system with more than 200,000 cards including electronic wallet services for transport, ORA, payment of fees, identification in libraries, in sports, ... covering the entire life cycle of the cards.
items.description: Development and implementation of a citizen card system.
items.summary:
More than 200K cards issued.

More than 20M movements per year.

Full life cycle management including graphic and electronic personalization.

Managed economic intercompensation among several entities.

items.name: Implementation and subsequent support-maintenance of an IoT and SOA platform for the industrial sector facilitating streaming and real-time event processing as well as service orchestration and API publication.
items.description: Implementation and subsequent support-maintenance of an IoT and SOA platform.
items.summary: Deployed a full on-premise kubernetes platform, including ESB, Stream Processor, Message Broker, API Manager, ...
